indicators.questionText: Toilets and urinals clean, disinfected and free of mineral deposits, urine and fecal matter; floors swept disinfected and washed down. .
Comments made by HC and/or Administrators
Cleanliness of sinks, mirrors and fixtures - clean, disinfected, no stains or grimm and minimal mineral deposits.
Liquid soap, paper towel and toilet paper adequately stocked.
Graffiti removed and tile walls clean.
Stairwells swept and free of spills, food and rubbish. Water fountains clean and polished; area around water fountains clean; no gum, candy, etc stuck on the floor.
Room window sills, counters and louvers cleaned, wiped and/or dusted.
Room floors swept and/or mopped; trash emptied and liners replaced; white board rails wiped and clean.
